title: Without a sound
creator_credit: Michael Henry, University of Melbourne, Victorian College of the Arts and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: Thomas is an insurance investigator called out on the eve of his wife leaving, to attend a mysterious fire in which an unknown boy has been killed. Going through the motions while awaiting a call from his wife, Thomas - like the viewer, is drawn into the mysteries of the fire. (Awards: Best Cinematography, nominated Best Film, Best Sound, VCA, 1998)
